author: jm
msg: bug 5612: DB_File version 4.2.x has a bug that loops infinitely if files named '__db.{filename}' are present; work around.  thanks to J. Nick Koston for the report and fix

author: rolandw
msg: added Apache header to apt files, minor rephrasing

author: jm
msg: bug 5606: too-early init_learner() call causes root's user prefs file to be read when spamd is started; this is inappropriate. fix

author: jm
msg: bug 4179: if allow_user_rules is 1, user rules are not unique to each user; one user's user rules can appear in later scans for other users that are run using the same spamd process. fix
